{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=Mesh3 |revision=(Nova MW6) |asin=B076JLJVTG;US;,B076VPYT36;GB;, |newegg= |price=250 |series=AC1200 |est_release_date=10/30/2017 |fcc_date=08/23/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router, wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=V7TMESH3 |ic_id=9034A-MESH3 |pcb_id=10033428 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H4C81P3 GH15E5; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q127CSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H4C81P3 GH15E5; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, H2A67E1 GH07; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8363NB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;85331-11, 58684ES4, 1710 MX;2; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743-11;85743-11, 59524ES4, 1713 MX;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=E8:65:D4 |oui_eth=E8:65:D4 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/MW6.html}} "10033428" and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :May also be referred to by the model name '''Nova MW6'''. ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/tenda-nova-whole-home-mesh-wifi-system-realtek-based.40997/ ''Tenda Nova Whole Home Mesh WiFi System'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tenda-nova-mw6-review ''Tenda Nova MW6 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[http://www.acwifi.net/5465.html ''Tenda Nova MW6'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/SAM_3553-2.jpg PCB images]) ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems#Tenda Nova]] *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5s)|Tenda Mesh5s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5S (2018-07-20) *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5)|Tenda Mesh5]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5 (2018-07-19) *[[Tenda Mesh3-18 (Nova MW6 2018)|Tenda Mesh3s-18]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3-18 (2018-05-09) *[[Tenda Mesh3f (Nova MW3)|Tenda Mesh3f]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3F (2018-05-02) *[[Tenda Mesh3s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3S (2018-01-24) *[[Tenda Mesh3 (Nova MW6) |Tenda Mesh3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3 (2017-08-23) __NOTOC__
